verses.verse: And there shall come <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H2415>rod<s%> out of the <S%H4480>stem<s%> <S%H1503><s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse,<s%> and a <S%H5342>Branch<s%> shall <S%H6509>grow<s%> out of his <S%H4480>roots:<s%> <S%H8328><s%>

And the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5117>rest<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him, the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H998>understanding,<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H6098>counsel<s%> and <S%H1369>might,<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> and of the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%>

And shall make him of quick <S%H7306>understanding<s%> in the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8199>judge<s%> after the <S%H4758>sight<s%> of his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H3198>reprove<s%> after the <S%H4926>hearing<s%> of his ears: <S%H241><s%>

But with <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> shall he <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H1800>poor,<s%> and <S%H3198>reprove<s%> with <S%H4334>equity<s%> for the <S%H6035>meek<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and he shall <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> with the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and with the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of his <S%H8193>lips<s%> shall he <S%H4191>slay<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
And <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H232>girdle<s%> of his <S%H4975>loins,<s%> and <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> the <S%H232>girdle<s%> of his <S%H2504>reins.<s%>

The <S%H2061>wolf<s%> also shall <S%H1481>dwell<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H3532>lamb,<s%> and the <S%H5246>leopard<s%> shall lie <S%H7257>down<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H1423>kid;<s%> and the <S%H5695>calf<s%> and the young <S%H3715>lion<s%> and the <S%H4806>fatling<s%> <S%H3162>together;<s%> and a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5288>child<s%> shall <S%H5090>lead<s%> them.

And the <S%H6510>cow<s%> and the <S%H1677>bear<s%> shall <S%H7462>feed;<s%> their young <S%H3206>ones<s%> shall lie <S%H7257>down<s%> <S%H3162>together:<s%> and the <S%H738>lion<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> like the <S%H1241>ox.<s%>

And the <S%H3243>sucking<s%> child shall <S%H8173>play<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H2352>hole<s%> of the <S%H6620>asp,<s%> and the weaned <S%H1580>child<s%> shall <S%H1911>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H6848>cockatrice's<s%> <S%H3975>den.<s%>

They shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7489>hurt<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7843>destroy<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall be <S%H4390>full<s%> of the <S%H1844>knowledge<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> as the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

And in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H8328>root<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> for an <S%H5251>ensign<s%> of the <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> it shall the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%> <S%H1875>seek:<s%> and his <S%H4496>rest<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3519>glorious.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that the <S%H136>Lord<s%> shall set his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> the second <S%H8145>time<s%> to <S%H7069>recover<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7605>remnant<s%> of his <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall be <S%H7604>left,<s%> from <S%H4480>Assyria,<s%> <S%H804><s%> and from <S%H4480>Egypt,<s%> <S%H4714><s%> and from <S%H4480>Pathros,<s%> <S%H6624><s%> and from <S%H4480>Cush,<s%> <S%H3568><s%> and from <S%H4480>Elam,<s%> <S%H5867><s%> and from <S%H4480>Shinar,<s%> <S%H8152><s%> and from <S%H4480>Hamath,<s%> <S%H2574><s%> and from the <S%H4480>islands<s%> <S%H339><s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

And he shall set <S%H5375>up<s%> an <S%H5251>ensign<s%> for the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and shall <S%H622>assemble<s%> the <S%H5080>outcasts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and gather <S%H6908>together<s%> the <S%H5310>dispersed<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> from the <S%H4480>four<s%> <S%H702><s%> <S%H3671>corners<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

The <S%H7068>envy<s%> also of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> shall <S%H5493>depart,<s%> and the <S%H6887>adversaries<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off:<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7065>envy<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6887>vex<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%>

But they shall <S%H5774>fly<s%> upon the <S%H3802>shoulders<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> toward the <S%H3220>west;<s%> they shall <S%H962>spoil<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1121>them<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H3162>together:<s%> they shall <S%H4916>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon <S%H123>Edom<s%> and <S%H4124>Moab;<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> shall <S%H4928>obey<s%> them.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptian<s%> <S%H3220>sea;<s%> and with his <S%H5868>mighty<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> shall he <S%H5130>shake<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H5104>river,<s%> and shall <S%H5221>smite<s%> it in the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5158>streams,<s%> and make men go <S%H1869>over<s%> <S%H5275>dry-shod.<s%>

And there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H4546>highway<s%> for the <S%H7605>remnant<s%> of his <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall be <S%H7604>left,<s%> from <S%H4480>Assyria;<s%> <S%H804><s%> like <S%H834>as<s%> it <S%H1961>was<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he came <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
